overview: Brian Conn has served as a financial executive in high growth companies for over twenty years, within and outside of the life sciences industry. Since 2000, Mr. Conn has held executive positions, including Chief Financial Officer with Chemicon International, Serologicals Corporation, Millipore Corporation and MicroIslet Inc. From 1995 to 2000, he was Vice President of Finance and Corporate Controller for Vista Information Solutions, Inc. an internet-based real estate information supplier. From 1988 to 1995, Mr. Conn served various financial and executive roles in healthcare and real estate companies. He has extensive experience with capital transactions, mergers and acquisitions and ERP implementations. Mr. Conn holds a BS in Finance from Arizona State University.
